modName: MorrowLoot for Dummies - Milkdrinkers Ultimate Edition
summary:
Patch for MorrowLoot that removes the Crafting/LeveledList restrictions.
Turns Morrowloot into a glorified scavenger hunt.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=5]MorrowLoot for Dummies - Milkdrinkers Ultimate Edition[/size][/color]
By - UWShocks
=================================================================
[color=red]Description:[/color]

This is a patch [ESP replacer] that removes the Crafting and Leveled List restrictions imposed by MorrowLoot. Thus, restoring ability to craft armor/weapons like in vanilla Skyrim.
--Turns MorrowLoot into a scavenger hunt; you can get all the artifacts, still craft everything, and enemies have access to higher tier weapons/armors.
================================================================
[color=red]Installation:[/color]

Requires you to have the original MorrowLoot installed first.
--Should work for all MorrowLoot versions:
----Nexus: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212/[/url]
----TESAlliance: [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1412-morrowloot/]http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1412-morrowloot/[/url]
----Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78468293&tscn=1405037726]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78468293&tscn=1405037726[/url]

Overwrite "MorrowLoot.esp" with my included version.
==================================================================
[color=red]Compatibility:[/color]
Should be compatible with everything, since my patch turns MorrowLoot into a scavenger hunt.
==================================================================
Patch provided as is. However, I personally use this patch, and I haven't had any adverse effects.
==================================================================
[color=red]Permissions:[/color]
Do whatever you want with the patch.

Thank you to Trainwiz for giving me permission to publish this patch.
author: UWShocks
